slide.title: Current Drupal 7 CVS Checkout

example.title: Baseline Benchmark Drupal 7 PHP-5.3.3 PHP-FPM Nginx 0.7.64

slide.example: |0077aa|~>| siege -c 5 -b -t30s http://drupal/ **SIEGE 2.67 **Preparing 5 concurrent users for battle. The server is now under siege... Lifting the server siege... done. Transactions: 252 hits Availability: 100.00 % Elapsed time: 29.73 secs Data transferred: 0.60 MB Response time: *0.57 secs* Transaction rate: *8.48 trans/sec* Throughput: 0.02 MB/sec Concurrency: 4.87 Successful transactions: 252 Failed transactions: 0 Longest transaction: 2.90 Shortest transaction: 0.11
